```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(readxl)
library(ggpubr)
```

read in data
```{r}
df <- readxl::read_xlsx("../data/Fecal donor BMI vs recipient neuts.xlsx")
```

fix excel sheet 
```{r}
df <- df[-1,]

df <- df %>%
  dplyr::rename("saline" = `% VAT neutrophils`,
                "fecal" = `...6`) %>%
  tidyr::fill(BMI) %>%
  mutate(fecal = as.double(fecal))
```

```{r}
df %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = BMI, y = fecal)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm") +
  theme(base.size = 9) + 
  theme_bw() +
  xlab("Donor BMI") +
  ylab("% Neutrophils in SVF") +
  stat_cor(method = "pearson", label.x = 20, label.y = 1.4)

ggsave("../figures/R01-SVFneutsBMI_scatterplot.png", width = 3, height = 3)
```
